info.title: Service for namespace ProductService
info.description:
This service is located at [http://localhost/Products.svc/](http://localhost/Products.svc/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](https://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-*>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[PeopleService.Supplier{bg:whitesmoke}],[Product]-0..1>[ProductDetail],[Product]^[FeaturedProduct{bg:orange}],[FeaturedProduct]-0..1>[Advertisement],[ProductDetail{bg:orange}],[ProductDetail]-0..1>[Product],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Advertisement{bg:orange}],[Advertisement]-0..1>[FeaturedProduct],[Products{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Product],[ProductDetails{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[ProductDetail],[Categories{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Category],[Advertisements{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Advertisement])

### Legend
![Legend](https://yuml.me/diagram/plain;dir:TB;scale:60/class/[External.Type{bg:whitesmoke}],[ComplexType],[EntityType{bg:orange}],[EntitySet_or_Singleton{bg:dodgerblue}])

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Products HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
